A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Lazy\, lazy film\, thoroughly annoying and spitting in the face of 40 years of Star Wars. So lazy that even your 5-star-Review -Bots can't think of anything else to say then:\"Thoroughly enjoyable for any Star Wars fan!\". REALLY? There must have been a lot of envelopes changing hands and Disney knew fine well what a desaster of a movie they produced. How comes the majority of Audiance Reviewers absolutely condemn the film \, but its still at 50% at Rotten Tomatoes? Only solution: REMAKE VIII !!
